content: {"locationId": "8622", "organizationId": "7111", "name": "North County Community Food Bank", "address1": "17 NE 3rd Ave", "address2": "", "city": "Battle Ground", "state": "WA", "zipCode": "98604", "country": null, "phone": "360-687-5007", "phoneExt": "", "website": "http://www.nccfoodbank.org ", "latitude": "45.7814231", "longitude": "-122.5340793", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "", "aboutUs": "NCCFoodBank serves all those in need with caring respect, dignity and integrity.  We provide one food box per month through curbside service delivery so we ask that you stay in your vehicle and our amazing volunteers will assist you with a smile and caring heart. ", "notes": "NCCFoodBank is closed on all Holidays.    We also provide our wonderful volunteers with a break in December to be with their families, so we are generally open the first two weeks, then closed until after January 1st.", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "360-687-5007", "contactEmail": "executive.director@nccfoodbank.org", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 62, "regionName": "Clark County Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "9bf000f5-bac8-4ee4-940a-e34b2fd8f20d.png", "website": "https://www.clarkcountyfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Pacific Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "PT", "offsetHours": "-7", "schedules": ["Monday 9:00 AM-11:15 AM", "Monday 1:30 PM-3:15 PM", "Tuesday 9:00 AM-11:15 AM", "Tuesday 1:30 PM-3:15 PM", "Wednesday 9:00 AM-11:15 AM", "Wednesday 1:30 PM-3:15 PM", "Thursday 9:00 AM-11:15 AM", "Thursday 1:30 PM-3:15 PM", "Friday 9:00 AM-11:15 AM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
